## Algo de informaci√≥n oficial

```{r}
library(sf)
library(janitor)
library(tidyverse)
library(kableExtra)

# https://ideocuc-ocuc.hub.arcgis.com/search?collection=Dataset
# datos enero 2020
datos_urbanos <- read_sf("datos/sup_areas_verdes_stgo.geojson")

areas_verdes <- 
datos_urbanos %>%
  as_tibble() %>%
  mutate(clase = case_when(str_detect(clase, "PARQUE") ~ "PARQUE",
                           .default = clase)) %>%
  group_by(clase, estado_2) %>% 
  summarise(area = sum(area_m2))%>% 
  ungroup() 

areas_verdes %>% 
  mutate(estado = case_match(estado_2,
      "BUEN" ~ "Buen estado",
      "MAL" ~ "Mal estado")) %>% 
  group_by(clase) %>% 
  mutate(area_p = round(area * 100 / sum(area), 2)) %>% 
  mutate(clase = paste(clase,estado)) %>% 
  select(-estado, -estado_2, clase, area_p, area) %>% 
  kable(booktabs = T, escape = F, align = "c",
        col.names = c("Estado","metros cuadrados", "%"),
        caption = "An√°lisis calidad estado plazas") %>%
  kable_classic(
    full_width = F,
    position = "center", font_size = 20
  ) %>% 
  footnote(symbol = "Fuente: Minvu v√≠a Observatorio de Ciudades UC, 2017")

```

## Cosas a futuro: ciudad cambiante

### Temperaturas superficiales promedio Enero 2012 (izq.) vs. 2022 (der.)

```{r}
library(leaflet)
library(leaflet.extras2)
library(terra)
# Raster Modis promedio superficie entre el 1 y 31 enero 2012
temp2012 <- rast("rasters/MODIS_LST_Santiago_Period1_2012.tif") 
# Raster Modis promedio superficie entre el 1 y 31 enero 2022
temp2022 <- rast("rasters/MODIS_LST_Santiago_Period2_2022.tif") 

pal <- colorNumeric(c("lightyellow", "orange", "red"), values(temp2022),
                    na.color = "transparent")

leaflet() %>%
  addMapPane("right", zIndex = 0) %>%
  addMapPane("left",  zIndex = 0) %>%
  addTiles(group = "base", layerId = "baseid1", options = pathOptions(pane = "right")) |> 
  addTiles(group = "base", layerId = "baseid2", options = pathOptions(pane = "left")) %>%
   addRasterImage(x = temp2012, colors = pal,options = leafletOptions(pane = "left"), group = "2012", opacity = 0.5) %>%
  addRasterImage(x = temp2022, colors = pal,options = leafletOptions(pane = "right"), group = "2022", opacity = 0.5) %>%
  addLayersControl(overlayGroups = c("temp2012", "temp2022")) |>  
  addLegend(pal = pal, values = values(temp2022),
            title = "Surface temp") %>%
  addSidebyside(layerId = "sidecontrols",
                rightId = "baseid1",
                leftId  = "baseid2") %>%
  setView(lng=-70.6505019, lat=-33.4378234, zoom= 11)

```
